data.title: Fantasy
data.teaser:
Fantasy - a musical with 100 performers trained by Biodanza in Münster, Dusseldorf, Soest and Cologne.
Aiming for a total of 8 shows, with the highlight of performing at the "German Dance Week" in Dusseldorf, 60 social, mental or physical disabled people will be trained together with 40 non-disabled people for over a year to put the show together. Money is needed to ensure the trevelling costs for the rehearsals and performances, to buy the costumes and to do a successful marketing compaign.
answers: Fantasy is an integrative musical production, which takes place on a cruise ship. On the ship there is a blind passanger, a crime story needs to be solved and a romantic love story develops.

The main goal of the project is to make the social medium of dance accessible to people with handicaps.
We want to create an integrative project to show the community what is possible with integration and to abolish prejudices.
Further we want to create a special form of entertainment which will be very memorable for every audience member, as they can feel what the performances mean to the handicapped performers.
